function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic spreading at an unprecedented speed","Impact":"High risk of community transmission","Mitigation":"Policy interventions and public health measures to control spread","Technologies":"Contact tracing, testing, vaccine development","People":"General public, workplace employees","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Organizations entering different stages of workplace management during the pandemic","Impact":"Uncertainties in post-COVID workplace modifications","Mitigation":"Strategic planning, risk assessment, flexibility in workplace design","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, workplace distancing tools","People":"Workplace managers, business leaders","Owner":"Organizations, workplace management teams"}]}
